stories.title: Update Design System documentation for desktop-first
stories.description: Update DESIGN_SYSTEM.md to reflect the desktop-first approach, including new layout patterns, header navigation, and responsive breakpoint strategy
acceptance_criteria: DESIGN_SYSTEM.md layout section describes desktop-first approach
Header navigation pattern is documented with code examples
Mobile hamburger menu pattern is documented
Responsive breakpoints updated (desktop default, md: for tablet, mobile fallback)
Bottom navigation section is removed or marked as deprecated
Dialog pattern is documented instead of Drawer for forms

stories.title: Create Header navigation component
stories.description: Create a new Header component for desktop navigation with logo, navigation links, and support for mobile hamburger menu
acceptance_criteria: File exists at src/components/navigation/Header.tsx
Header displays Needled logo (Syringe icon + text) on the left
Navigation links (Home, Weight, Profile) displayed horizontally
Current page has active state with lime accent
Header has fixed positioning at top of viewport
Header has dark background with border-bottom
Uses Link from next/link for navigation

stories.title: Add mobile hamburger menu to Header
stories.description: Implement responsive behaviour for the Header - collapse to hamburger menu on screens smaller than 768px
acceptance_criteria: Navigation links hidden on screens < md (768px)
Hamburger icon (Menu) visible on screens < md
Clicking hamburger opens a slide-out or dropdown menu
Mobile menu contains same navigation links
Mobile menu can be closed by clicking outside or X button
Logo remains visible on mobile
Install shadcn sheet component if needed: npx shadcn@latest add sheet

stories.title: Update root layout for desktop
stories.description: Modify the root layout to support wider desktop content and include the Header component
acceptance_criteria: src/app/layout.tsx imports and renders Header component
Header only renders for authenticated routes (not landing, onboarding, login)
Main content container uses max-w-5xl instead of max-w-md
Content is centered with mx-auto
Top padding accounts for fixed header height (pt-16 or pt-20)
Mobile safe area classes removed from layout

stories.title: Update Home page layout for desktop
stories.description: Update the Home page to use the new desktop layout with Header and wider content
acceptance_criteria: src/app/home/page.tsx no longer imports or uses BottomNav
Page uses desktop-appropriate padding (px-6 instead of px-4)
Safe area padding classes (pt-safe, pb-24) removed
Content renders well at 1280px viewport width
Quick action cards can display in a grid on desktop (grid-cols-2 on md:)
Page looks good at both desktop and mobile widths

stories.title: Convert WeighInInput from Drawer to Dialog
stories.description: Replace the mobile slide-up Drawer with a centered Dialog for weight input
acceptance_criteria: src/components/weigh-in/WeighInInput.tsx uses Dialog instead of Drawer
Dialog appears centered on screen (not slide-up from bottom)
Form fields and buttons work the same as before
Dialog has appropriate max-width for desktop (max-w-md)
Dialog can be closed with X button or clicking outside
Form validation still works correctly
Install shadcn dialog if not present: npx shadcn@latest add dialog
